mapper.sql: id, template_code, template_name, template_type, customerId, customerName, remark, param1, creator, create_time, last_modifier, last_modify_time, del_flag, template_type_code
mapper.select:
select
from price_transport_template where 1=1
order by create_time desc,id desc

select
from price_transport_template where 1=1
order by create_time desc,id desc limit 1

select
from price_transport_template where id=#{id} order by create_time desc,id desc
mapper.insert: insert into price_transport_template(template_code, template_name, template_type, remark, param1, creator, create_time, last_modifier, last_modify_time, del_flag, template_type_code, customerid, customerName) values ( #{templateCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{templateName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{templateType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{param1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{lastModifier,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lastModifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{delFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{templateTypeCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{customerId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{customerName,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
mapper.update: update price_transport_template set template_code=#{templateCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, template_name=#{templateName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, template_type=#{templateType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, template_type_code=#{templateTypeCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, customerid = #{customerId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, customerName = #{customerName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, remark=#{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, param1=#{param1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, creator=#{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time=#{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, last_modifier=#{lastModifier,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, last_modify_time=#{lastModifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, del_flag=#{delFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id=#{id}
